title: Asian Stocks Fall on Tech Concerns, Bitcoin Slips: Markets Wrap
description: Asian markets opened lower in the final full trading week of 2025 as mounting concerns over the earnings outlook for technology companies — and their massive spending on AI — sapped risk sentiment.
content: Asian markets opened lower in the final full trading week of 2025 as mounting concerns over the earnings outlook for technology companies — and their massive spending on AI — sapped risk sentiment.
